description: Motoharu`s younger step-sister. She wears a maid attire (as she goes to a Maid School) and rides on top of a cleaning `bot. She has a friendly relationship with Touma and knows that he has two girls (Index and Aisa) living with him but keeps the secret between her and Touma and is a good friend of Mikoto as she works at her school. Even though she lives in her school`s dormitory, she sometimes goes to live at her brother`s apartment; for instance, in episode ten, she stays at said residence because her dormitory`s air conditioner breaks down.
name: Tsuchimikado Maika
